title: Safety Bulletin 2/2011
raw_html:
Report name:
Tombarra SB2
Incident date:
07 February 2011
Category:
Merchant vessels
Summary:
Malfunction of a proximity switch, which resulted in failure of a fall wire with the loss of one life on the car carrier Tombarra. Issued 12 May 2011.

body:
Malfunction of a proximity switch, which resulted in failure of a fall wire with the loss of one life on the car carrier Tombarra. Issued 12 May 2011.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (1,451.62 kb) 

An Investigation Report was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on this website:  
[Read Accident Investigation Report](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/investigation_reports/2012/tombarra___part_a.cfm)
